text: In case you've forgotten your login credentials, you can reset your password by visiting this link: [{url}].
To view your order history and manage your settings, please log in to your account.

Our shipping information is available on our help center page: [{url}]. We offer complimentary standard shipping on all orders exceeding $50. For expedited shipping options, please visit our Shipping Information page.
Here's the link to the {blank_spot} category you requested: [{url}]
Your {size} sized {color} {clothing} has been successfully added to your cart. Proceed to checkout to complete your purchase.

To track your order, please provide your order number and we'll be happy to retrieve the status for you.
To assist you with your refund request, could you please provide your order number about your recent purchase?
We're happy to assist you with your return. Please provide your order number of the item you wish to return.
